hanzi-su-wiki:
塁

Значения

Земляное укрепление, форт

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Тюки 田 с почвой 土. Бруствер, заграждение, вал.

Варианты

壘, 垒
purpleculture_pinyin:
lěi
Japanese variant of 垒
Японский вариант базы
rtega_mnemonic:
壘壘RS
垒垒		塁rampart, military wall, base
  • dike between fields 畾 made of ground 土
  • ⓢ many individuals 厽 defending their ground 土 on a rampart
  • modf. 壘 → 塁
  • place 土 on the field 田 marked by a cross X
  • four places 土 on the field 田 marked by 丿 in baseball: base
heisig_constituent: bases, rice field, brains, sparkler, soil, dirt, ground
heisig_story: The kanji of this frame refers to the four bases that are placed at the corners of a baseball infield. The elements: field . . . sparkler . . . ground.
koohiiStory1: Playing baseball in a rice field with sparklers stuck into the ground to act as bases.
koohiiStory2: The traditional New Year´s baseball game in Japan is held at midnight in a rice field. They stick sparklers in the ground for the bases so they can be seen, and to be more festive.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There's an explosion in the dirt under a rice paddy, exposing the hidden base under there. A base from baseball! I guess this rice paddy was built on top of an old baseball field...
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture a serene rice paddy. Now watch the whole thing explode, rice and dirt going everywhere, and a secret, underground baseball base is left there, smoldering.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Unfortunately, thanks to the explosion, the base is in ruins (るい). It's dark and smokey and kinda half burned. You probably can't get this in a regulation game.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Hold this ruined base in your hands. Darn, you love baseball. At least it's a collectible.

塁
Name meaning
Nothing.
lěi
яп. вм. 垒
Radicals: 田, 土  (rice-paddy, dirt, explosion)
Meaning Mnemonic
There's an explosion in the dirt under a rice paddy, exposing the hidden base under there. A base from baseball! I guess this rice paddy was built on top of an old baseball field...
Picture a serene rice paddy. Now watch the whole thing explode, rice and dirt going everywhere, and a secret, underground baseball base is left there, smoldering.
Reading Mnemonic
Unfortunately, thanks to the explosion, the base is in ruins (るい). It's dark and smokey and kinda half burned. You probably can't get this in a regulation game.
Hold this ruined base in your hands. Darn, you love baseball. At least it's a collectible.
